snippet: A look back at some statements by the president since his 2004 bid for United States Senate shows his gradual “evolution” toward an endorsement of gay marriage.
lead_paragraph: A look back at some statements by the president since his 2004 bid for United States Senate shows his gradual “evolution” toward an endorsement of gay marriage.
